评论详情: So comfortable and warm. Material is thicker than other jumpsuits making it easy to wear on its own or under your outfit. Flattering to wear.

I loved this outfit so much. It’s stretchy but the size I got was perfect for the 2nd trimester. I had a big belly my 3rd so I got another one. For the price it was great for 12-15 weeks I wore it and pp
this is great wearing under normal clothes. its constricting in the right spots and perfect for my belly
So cute and stretchy thick great material I loved it

The texture of it is amazing soo breathable. Perfect for a sunny day. The material makes it stretchable especially for the belly !🙂 it is one of my favorite outfits to wear at 9 months pregnant because of how comfortable you can be all day long. Medium size was perfect fit. I would recommend large if you want it to be a little more loose. The best thing is it makes look like you took your time getting ready without the extra effort ( which believe me at 9 months pregnant that’s the last thing on your mind.) totally worth it !!!! My only mistake is not getting it in all colors
This is such a cute comfortable outfit for pregnancy. It’s not like this lose ugly maternity clothes but stylish and great for the weather. It’s very flattering and easy to get on and off.

I loved the texture and extra room in belly section. I got this at the end of my pregnancy 8 months and it was great! I wish the boob section was tighter for support but I just wore a bra because it was looser for me and I didn't like the fabric continually rubbing on my boobs.

The belly area is a different pattern so I did not enjoy that. Otherwise it was comfortable, thick so no showing off the lady bits, and easy to throw on with a long shirt and look put together. One other negative is that due to the belly area it can’t be worn outside of pregnancy which sucks.
Absolutely loved this during my pregnancy. Fit great and stretchy
LOVED this romper during the summer months of my pregnancy. Easy to throw on, comfy, stretchy. Just perfect!
Wore this bodysuit almost my entire pregnancy. So cute and comfortable and it made me feel cute toke even being huge. It fit great, true to size and so easy to style.
I love this! So comfy and fits perfect! Maternity closet staple!
As soon as I opened it, there was already a hole in the fabric! Not the best quality!

I was skeptical about this one but it really is comfortable and very supportive of my growing belly. I also used under dresses as my shape wear since it’s comfy. I’m a pretty thick girl and a large surprisingly is not tight at all and stretches very well. Started wearing at 22 weeks and still wearing at 30
Especial para el embarazo y poder estar a gusto en casa con tu pancita

I’m only giving this a 4 star because the legs are a bit tight. I wore a size XS before I got pregnant and ordered in a S. Glad I went with a S because the legs get a bit tight but overall it looks great and is very flattering. I would recommend sizing up one size.

Wore is through the end of my pregnancy and under one of my outfits for my maternity shoot. Very cheap for the good quality, fits amazing around your stomach and isn’t to tight. I definitely love it and would but again!

This romper/onesie is a must have when pregnant! I am typically a Medium so that’s what I ordered and it fits great! There is a change in fabric on the bump part itself, so you do need to have a bump to wear for it to look good! I got the black and the light cream colors. The cream is a bit see through. The stretch and comfort is great!
The inseam is superrrrr short and the fabric for the belly looks like an attached deflated helium balloon. Almost like a separate compartment lol
Got a black one, it’s comfortable, fits well through the pregnancy, and not see through.

评论详情: A very comfortable and good-quality maternity leggings. The material is soft, and the fit is perfect, providing support without being uncomfortable. Still, I highly recommend it for its comfort and practical design during pregnancy
Luce bien y tiene buena tela. Para mí no funcionó bien porque soy larga de tronco y me tira mucho

I hoped to love this, but it has a weird pattern on the fabric that stops in a circle around the belly. It fit okay, but it will not look so awkward if not pregnant. Not worth it to me if I can’t wear it later on so I am returning.
Was super cute , however the belly area is a different material and isn’t consistent with the rest of the romper.
This romper is perfect if you are pregnant and looking for something comfortable to wear during the hot summer months.

Wore this daily in the summer second trimester. Got a medium because I have thick thighs. Cute with button down. I’m a small normally (not pregnant 125lbs, 5’5)
Love it I need a bigger size now
Really nice around the belly
These are really short and I can't wear them out in public otherwise I will flash my butt to the entire world.

I wear this at least once a week! It’s so soft and comfortable! I could’ve gone a size up now that I’m later in my pregnancy but it still fits great and looks adorable. I usually wear a medium in everything so that’s what I ordered
This material on the belly dues not match the ready of the outfit and the dye is uneven.

I purchased this during my first trimester, and I absolutely love it! The quality is excellent and super soft. I also appreciate knowing I can keep using it well into my third trimester. Highly recommend!
loved wearing this when i was pregnant, stretchy and comfy
So comfortable and will accommodate my growing belly! 27 weeks pregnant and ordered a large, it fits perfect. I even went back and ordered it in another color too! Machine wash cold and hang to dry.
I’m not super into onesies so I got one to try it out and I live it it now. Thick enough to feel support (and workout in) but cute enough to throw on with a flannel or jacket. I’m buying more.
Love this romper and it's perfect for the bump! It's super comfortable. True to size too!
I now have in three colors.  Plus I look super cute in them :)

Wore this product to Universal Studios with a white over shirt and I am six months pregnant. Felt supported and extremely comfortable all day long. Material is soft and stretchy! Even got complimented by a random stranger.
Ribbed, kinda tight, would deff go up a size. Soft stretchy area for belly but thighs a little tight. I got a large 184 pounds

评论概述: Comfy for the beginning of your pregnancy
评论详情: I love this outfit! Throw on a cute crop top or a light coat and you are styling! It’s very comfortable but can be a pain in the butt when you get into your third trimester. I have this in a medium and large. The medium fits great in the upper region and straps but the large fits comfortably around my thighs. It really compliments my belly bump though.

I bought two of them. I'm almost eight months pregnant, and they're super comfortable. Although wearing a shirt over them can be inconvenient when I constantly need to pee and have to remove almost all my clothes, I highly recommend them.

I have liven in this since it came in. It is incredibly comfortable and have full coverage. I bought them when I was about 7 months pregnant and now at 9 months I am still wearing it comfortably!  I really do live in it from friday when I get off work to sunday night.
This was perfect for my announcement pics! It made my bump pop just a little extra :)

Super Comfortable to wear and support my belly during my pregnancy

评论概述: MY GO TO OUTFIT DURING MY PREGNANCY
评论详情: Super flattering, I get so many compliments on these. I bought these in three colors: cream, brown and black. I use them each once a week and I have so used them enough to get my moneys worth. Comfy thick material and holds you in all the right places no bra necessary. I love that as when I’m pregnant bras are a no for me. When I say thick I mean the fabric is well made definitely NOT SEE THROUGH, I wore it a lot in the summer time and I kept cool at a lot of outdoor events. I will wash it and hang dry it so I haven’t gotten any linty balls in any crotch areas but if you do the fabric is thick enough to use one of those lint grinders on.

Great bodysuit for the price. The top and legs are a bit tighter than expected but I ordered a size up and the belly has plenty of grow room. I’ll be able to get away without wearing a bra underneath for now for things like yoga, but would need extra support for a workout class. Feels good on, thick material, not see through, and good quality for the price. Currently about 150 lbs,16 weeks, and got a medium.
I love it. It is not see through which i loved. Its super comfortable and it can be styled so easily.

Very disappointed!!! Not for pregnant women. I went according to my size and size guide and it’s horrible!!! So tight I couldn’t breathe and I’m carrying extremely small this pregnancy. And now I have to go through the hassle of returning.
Very comfortable, but should have sized up

评论概述: I will live in this from now on
评论详情: I absolutely love this! Literally took it out of the package to try on and decided I won’t be taking it off. It is the most comfortable piece of maternity wear I own. The fabric is so soft and breathable but thick enough that I’m not self-conscious in it. The legs and chest/back are ribbed but the stomach is not, which I like. Pre-pregnancy, I hovered between a small and medium and went my ahead and ordered a medium and it fits perfectly. The short length is definitely on the shorter side (ie not bike shorts) but I was expecting/wanting that.
So comfy!! Love the fit!!! Not see through at all! I ordered the blue color and it’s really vibrant!
Loved wearing this so much during pregnancy that I bought multiple colors! They are cute, the material is comfortable, easy to style and a great value.
Soooo cute, comfy, and a great deal! Thick stretchy material with an even stretchier belly section for maternity growth! Fit is true to size.
Cute and comfy

I love this while being pregnant, I seen lots of reviews talking about the “scratch looking lines “ on the rompers . Yes when you first get them mine had it but after washing and drying they disappeared 1st wear you could see a couple up close but after the second wash they were completely gone. I started wear this in my 20ish week area and now I am 36 weeks and it still fits amazing. They do run small so I do recommend sizing up . I’m usually a small and I ordered medium. Material is super soft and comfy and this is super flattering to your bump and also gives you plenty of room to grow. If it wasn’t about to be cooling off I would order a couple more colors !
Absolutely love this it's so comfortable and stretchy, I'll definitely want another set!

I am a gymnastics coach 5'2 115lb pre pregnancy. Normally a small, but after readying reviews, bought a medium and it has fit great from 25 weeks to now 32 weeks. Made well, quality material and has been much more comfortable than the maternity bikeshorts I was wearing before.
Very comfortable one piece and great for layering while pregnant. Currently living in this piece while 8 months pregnant
Fits me perfectly! You can see my hump so cutely in it and it’s beyond comfortable!
It fit to size but the material for the bump has these weird lines that are obvious.

Nice thick material definitely not see-through I’m typically a small or a medium. I ordered the small since maternity clothes are normally stretchy and this is definitely very stretchy. Not sure if I need to size up later on in the pregnancy but for now this fits great I’m about 18 weeks pregnant.

评论概述: Fits true to size pre pregnancy

LOVE these for summer pregnancy!! I lived in these every day this summer before having my baby. I started out with just one, then kept buying more colors after I realized it was the only comfortable thing in my closet. You won't regret buying this!

I love this one piece. It’s super stretchy, and gives room for growing during pregnancy without feeling too tight. I got this in both white and black, but definitely like the black better. It’s not see through either. You could wear this without a bra, but I’d recommend wearing one.

You will not regret getting these! I’ve bought two different colors and absolutely love them! The fit is perfect and so flattering. The material is soft and thick! Such high quality. I love all the colors!
Comfy on the belly and decent quality. Kind of feels like a wet suit and kind of rides up the legs though after some wearing. Just the material I think.

I was a little hesitant given this would be a partial-nude-situation in a public toilet, but this is so cute and comfy it’d be worth it! It was thick but super stretchy. It’s durable enough that I could possibly wear this even after giving birth as well.

Love this romper in 26 weeks pregnant and in my normal small. Love wearing this running errands with sandals and a little sweater or more athletic. Lightweight, pretty cream color and nice quality pretty thick but elastic! Keeps belly supported and I can just wear nipple covers with this.

Absolutely love these! I have black and the blue. Ordered when I was in my second trimester and they still fit comfortably in the third. Very stretchy, great quality, and not see through.

This outfit looks fire on my fiance! She’s 5 months pregnant and it shows off the bump while being flattering in all the right places. Whether it’s out for dinner, a night at home or wearing it to work.

I bought this last night as a last minute outfit for a concert. It just came in and oh my gosh if this is not the most comfortable thing I’ve worn my entire pregnancy. Absolutely love this! I ordered a medium, I'm 5'3 155 pounds, 21 weeks pregnant. It's super stretchy and has room to keep growing in. I am ordering in more colors.

Love it, so comfy I bought a medium cause I though I should go bigger cause of pregnancy but no they are true to size. I am 5’3, 130lb and a small would have worked. Enough room for growing belly!
Value for money easy to wear, good stretch and quality, very comfortable

im usually a L or XL but definitely just if ur an xl don’t get it. i’m pregnant and too big for it and if you have larger boobs ur popping stuff out girl
